com.revature.dao

Class PokemonDaoSql

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revature.dao.PokemonDaoSql
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PokemonDao

    public class PokemonDaoSql
extends java.lang.Object
implements PokemonDao
    Pokemon DAO which handles the pokemon data. Save a pokemon to your box, save your whole team, fetch a single pokemon, fetch your team, fetch your box.
    Author:
    Kristoffer Spencer
